thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 15 of 3563
thread.title: Daniel

author: Daniel
title: Daniel
text: Thrift books is above and beyond what one would expect in an online distributor of used books. Their service is always as claimed, the books are in the condition one chooses, and the shipping is prompt. Their prices are better than their competitors and the selection seems well stocked in each category. I would suggest Thriftbooks to those who are looking to stay well read while also helping the environment. I have sent several customers in their direction. I will continue to be a loyal customer as long as they continue to stockpile such a plethora of good reads.
